title: "Artificial intelligence can be a patent 'inventor,' U.S. appeals court told"
excerpt: "A computer scientist on Monday tried to persuade a U.S. appeals court that his artificial intelligence system should be credited for two inventions it generated, in a novel dispute on the proper role of AI in patent law."
